title: 10-Minute Veggie Pasta
summary: A quick and healthy vegetarian pasta dish with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add courgette and bell pepper, cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add cherry tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes until softened.
Drain pasta and add to the pan with vegetables.
Toss everything together and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot topped with fresh basil and parmesan cheese.

title: Avocado Toast with Poached Eggs
summary: Perfect breakfast with creamy avocado and protein-rich eggs.
instructions: Toast the sourdough bread until golden brown.
Bring a pot of water to a gentle simmer and add vinegar.
Crack eggs into separate bowls, then gently lower into simmering water.
Cook eggs for 3-4 minutes for runny yolks.
Meanwhile, mash avocado with lime juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture on toast.
Carefully remove poached eggs with a slotted spoon.
Place eggs on top of avocado toast and garnish with chives and red pepper flakes.

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
summary: Healthy Mediterranean-inspired quinoa bowl with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions, then let cool.
In a large bowl, combine cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
Add cooled quinoa to the bowl.
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over quinoa mixture and toss well.
Top with crumbled feta cheese and olives.
Let sit for 5 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Green Smoothie Bowl
summary: Nutrient-packed smoothie bowl with fresh fruits and vegetables.
instructions: Add frozen banana, spinach, avocado, and coconut milk to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add chia seeds and honey, blend briefly to combine.
Pour into a bowl.
Top with fresh berries, granola, and coconut flakes.
Serve immediately for best texture.

title: Classic Caprese Salad
summary: Classic Italian salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a serving plate.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Let sit for 5 minutes to allow flavors to develop.
Serve at room temperature.
